Mt Ruapehu’s crater lake still running at record cool temps - but sudden eruption considered unlikely https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/mt-ruapehus-crater-lake-still-running-at-record-cool-temps-but-sudden-eruption-considered-unlikely/O7OD2IPVMVAKRKMW36FGEMCPDU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/mt-ruapehus-crater-lake-still-running-at-record-cool-temps-but-sudden-eruption-considered-unlikely/O7OD2IPVMVAKRKMW36FGEMCPDU/ Jamie MortonRuapehu crater lake still unusually cool, while Whakaari's eruptive episode may be ending. Sun, 06 Oct 2024 03:24:03 +0000 Temperatures in Mt Ruapehu's Crater Lake dropped to a record-low 6.83C last month and, as at last week, were measuring about 8C – well down on the 31C peak temperature observed in mid-February.
